title: Vintage Heidelberg
content:
Hello.

Typeface from the guard of a vintage Heidelberg printing press...  
Any ideas of the face...

Thanks in advance : )

 [‹ Can anyone name these fonts?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605055126/http:/typophile.com/node/45908 "Go to previous forum topic") [An other retro script fonts.. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605055126/http:/typophile.com/node/45821 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Rez Oo

comments.content: I think it is hand made art. Then turned into a mould to press the metal plate. That plate in the press is actually a ’guard’ to protect the pressman.
